price: 32. (Allahas) tarė: „Iblis (Šėtone), kodėl tu nesi tarp sukniubusiųjų?“
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla yāib'līsu mā laka allā takūna maʿa al-sājidīna
